meanings.sent1: The little league team were the champs of the tournament.
meanings.sent2: The champs of the race received shiny medals.
meanings.sent3: The champs celebrated their victory with a pizza party.
meanings.sent4: She fought like a champ, never giving up.
meanings.sent5: Being the champs filled them with pride and joy.

meanings.sent1: The puppy chomped on his bone, champing away happily.
meanings.sent2: The cows champed on the fresh grass in the field.
meanings.sent3: He champed on his gum loudly during the movie.
meanings.sent4: The squirrel champed on the nut with determination.
meanings.sent5: The horse champed on the carrot, savoring every bite.

meanings.sent1: She champed down on the apple, breaking it into pieces.
meanings.sent2: The wrestler champed on his opponent's arm in the match.
meanings.sent3: He champed on the ice cream, trying to finish it before it melted.
meanings.sent4: The shark champed on the fishing line, trying to escape.
meanings.sent5: The machine champed on the metal, shaping it into a perfect curve.
